H0.text: The Livadia Palace near which Crimean city was the site of a 1945 Peace Conference. Sevastopol

H1.text: The Livadia Palace near which Crimean city was the site of a 1945 Peace Conference. Simferopol

H2.text: The Livadia Palace near which Crimean city was the site of a 1945 Peace Conference. Feodosiya

H3.text: The Livadia Palace near which Crimean city was the site of a 1945 Peace Conference. Ялта

A4.text: The Yalta Conference was held at Livadia Palace in 1945.
